Articles.Content: I've noticed that some people can link a webpage to the text that they type, instead of having to display an URL? How do I do that?

Above the text input box you will see icons, the icon with the chain link next to the emoticon is the one for adding a link, just highlight the text you want to use for the link, click that button and put the URL in the box

Alternatively, the way to type it out (if you are like me and don't like having it done for you) is like this: 

[noparse][url=http://www.url.to/destination]Text you want to be shown goes here.[/url][/noparse]
